desc: Please tell if you are an individual or a team/business when you apply.I need a React Native app for iPhone and Android. Your task will be the following:Create account (2 different options/accounts)Login, forgot passSettings and pages for each subsSearch functionsAdd picturesSmooth transitionsImplement NotificationsCreate 100% pixel perfect CSS work from existing mockups.Create the UX and UI from existing mockups.Insert URLs to pull JSON data (URLs will be provided).Make a backend for the app (I need to be able to control content such as titles, pictures etc).Upload and get approved on the stores (I will create a developer login for you).Work fulltime on the project and complete it within a short timeframe (14 days).Send me testversions IPA ans APK so I can give feedback, ask for corrections and bugs can be fixed.Accept that payment will be paid in the following Milestones:1st. $300. When the UX and UI is delivered in an IPA version (deadline 1 week) I will test and you make corrections if needed (1 day).2nd. $300. When the backend is created and fully functional (deadline 3 days) I will test, make comments and you will correct is needed (1 day).3rd. $200. Add the URLs provided by me (deadline 2 days).4th. $500. When the apps are approved on the stores.If I select you as my freelancer or team I expect you to start working on this project right away. I need you to work full time until this is completed - deadline is 14 days!!! You should be available and give updates every day while the project is running. Please tell me at what times you'll be available, thanks. About milestones: Please notice that I will only add one at the time so don't ask for the full amount when applying for this job! The first part will show me your level of skills (which I expect are high!) and therefore you should consider the first part as a test for you to prove yourself. If I'm happy with the results I'll add the rest of the milestones. You can expect a longterm relationship if I'm satisfied with your work.
title: React native - iPhone and Android app

desc: This is a QR code/Barcode Scanning App for EventsI am looking for a good engineer to help me to develop the app and its web control panel.Please see the detail below.<Overview>This is a QR code/Barcode Scanning App for EventsBefore the event, user goes to the web control panel, and upload the attendee list by CSV.On the web control panel, I can upload the attendee list by CSV. This has to be done before using the app.On the web control panel, I can see the attendee list.User login to the app, then download the attendee data from the web control panel into the app.User can read the QR code /barcode brought by event attendees.The app verifies attendee by matching the scanned data and pre-uploaded database.If it is successfully verified, "Check-in complete"message and the profile information is shown on the screen.  Success sound can be heard.  If "OK" is tapped, or wait for 5 seconds, it is ready to scan the next.If verification is failed, "Check-in error" message is shown. and error sound can be heard. If "OK" is tapped, or wait for 5 seconds, it is ready to scan the next.On the app setting screen, you can set "Self Check-in mode". if it is turned on, no need to tap "OK".Even if there is no QR code/barcode, you can search by unique ID and check-in.The app shows the real-time total number of check-in.The app shows the uploaded attendee name list. The list shows check-in status. "Checked-in" /"Not Checked-in".If user want to see "Who hasn't come yet", the list quickly show it on the app.The uploaded individual attendee's profile can be seen on the app. (Name, Company Name, Job Title, Mobile, Email address,Table No, Seat No,  Remarks)User can use this app by multiple iPhone/iPad.User needs to login and can use the app.If user login by same account on multiple devices, check-in scanning can be done by the multiple devices.This mobile app can be used under both online and offline.Under online, data will be auto-synchronized.If iPhone A scan 3 person, and iPhone B scan 6 persons,  both shows "9 persons has checked-in".Under offline mode, iPhone A and iPhone B's info cannot be synchronized. But the app itself can work.  Before using the app, the app needs to be under online.The user can use this app for multiple check print and different events.The user can manually modify/add/delete the database on the web control panel.User can download the attendee list by CSV.<Feature>Only iOS app (iPhone, iPod touch, and iPad)*If iPhone or iPod touch, the screen is portrait.But if iPad, the screen is landscape.Login (ID&Password)Select eventSelect Check PointMenu screenImport attendee data from the web control panelQR code scanning/ Barcode scanning  (Very high speed)Data matching (Scan info and Uploaded database)Time stamp of check-in timeShow attendee listShow attendee profileSetting screenReal-time chartWeb control panelCSV uploadData can be added/edited/deleted manually.SQL DatabaseAPI with AppCSV download<Sample App>[url removed, login to view]<Requirement>Experience of development of AppPHP,Java Script, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Swift, X-code, iOS Programming.Corporate is preferred, rather than one-man freelancer.Quick ResponseProfessional mannerLong term relationship.<Request>Show me the app you developed before.Development of the app from scratch.Quick Quotation -  How many hours x rate = $how much ?If you agree with the non-disclosure, I can send you the wireframe. (vp file)
title: QR code/Barcode Scanning App

desc: This is a project post to start building financial and budget numbers. This is going to be build under a freelancer company, so please bid actual numbers as a winner will be selected among bidders. This is not a race to the lowest price possible, but the variables that will be selected will be experience, team, projects and Freelancer rating.Project: We are aiming to build an APP for Costa Rica country only. This app is a freight service network were freight service people can enroll and offer their services to customers. From a Motorcycle messenger person that can deliver documents to trucks that can move families from house or heavy load freight services.Very similar to Uber app, were drivers and customers can enroll.Customer and Drivers BOTH:- Be able to enroll with Google, Facebook or regular email address.- Second level of identity with phone number and SMS confirmation to confirm phone number.- Display brief condition and terms to accept.- For Drivers:** select kind of vehicle they offer and be able to add a photo of vehicle.** Include Payout Bank information (remember this is only for Costa Rica).** Select area of services (map region) and other factors like lift truck availability, helpers availability, etc.- For Users:** Include payment method and save it (credit card or paypal).Global User Platform:- Select type of Service: Motorcycle, Car, pick up, truck.- Select Origin and Destiny on Map.- Add instructions and message.- Select immediately or calendar a pick up date.- When selecting Pick up truck or truck, select if lifting people of lift truck is needed.- Message Box to display what needs to be moved, size and weight.- Display a fixed rate, for motorcycle, car services, based on services and map total distance.- For Pick up truck and truck, app robot to contact nearby drivers with a base rate for distance and service requested, and let drivers add extra to total price, based on total load and service required. Drives be able to contact user via chat to ask questions on total load and service. Send photos through app chat. After drivers set bid service prices, user to select driver and display total rate.- Notify driver to go immediately or calendar pick up.- Be able to rate services and put message.- Be able to count total trips for Users and drivers.- Be able to run promotions like Notification base.- Track driver on Map, same as Uber. Display Name, Rate and profile photo.- Driver to start service when arrived. Loading time to be counted on rate. It is a fixed rate.IMPORTANT:- We need a web interface too were users can log in and request service too.- App user interface to be in Spanish language.- We require people and team that is committed to bring ideas on design and overall look of app, based on their experience.- We need a team that is committed to provide ongoing services for maintenance
title: Freight and Transport Service App for iPhone and Android plus a web interface

The app MUST be able to recognize the beginning of REM cycles in real time.2.) The logic behind monitoring one's sleep cycle will not be provided by me, but the developer must already have this knowledge and know how to create the sleep cycle app.3.) The app would ideally be iphone and android compatible.4.) We would also like your first message to describe how you will determine a REM cycle has begun (probably through monitoring movements and sounds during sleep through the phones' accelerometer and speakers), your background in creating sleep related apps or doing sleep related research. desc: EXTREMELY BASIC - NO STYLING NEEDED - LOOKS DO NOT MATTER -> ONLY FUNCTIONALITYThe objective of the game is to obtain as many hits on a randomly movinggraphic on the screen with the following rules:a. A hit occurs when the user touches a point that is within the area defined by the target graphic.b. A miss occurs when the user touches a point that is not within the area defined by the target graphic OR the time elapses (see below).c. The game is over when the sum of hits and misses reaches 10.d. The graphic will be displayed for a random amount of time (3sec) and will be no shorter than 3 seconds.e. If the time elapses, then a miss will be recorded and the graphic will berepositioned on the screen unless the game is over.Need to utilize Canvas to:a. Draw the graphic on the screen.b. Determine the size of the screen.c. Determine the size of the target graphic.Once the game is over, I just need it to display a "Game over" message and a message that says the hit percentage. example: 3 hits out of 10 would be 30%I also need all literal string data to be contained within the strings files. No strings may be hard-coded within the application and it must not crash due to invalid or missing input. Must be done in Android Studio and be called "Reflex"
